data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Cher, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cher, Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Cher, Centre-Val de Loire, France who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who are far from you in Cher. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,925 believers in Cher to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bourges
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bourges, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Cher, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Cher do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Cher, Centre-Val de Loire, France to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
